As they walked Lunarpine talked about the new body he'd 
recieved. "Can you do this with Shadow Wing too?" he'd hoped for the 
best gritting his teeth just in case of the worst.

"I don't think so, I'd need a fresh, unprogrammed protoform for that 
and DNA from the former body." I've already programmed her scanners 
to detect DNA and reject the one I programmed in. It'll keep trying 
that sequence until either that ones accepted or another ones found."

"I can get you some of her origional DNA, I know where her old body 
is." Lunarpine was anxious to get her back and wanted so badly to see 
her again that he'd do anything to get it. Even form an allegiance 
with the bot who had changed him behind his back.

"She'll be fine until you return." Veratis didn't mean it as a 
threat, just a warning. "If you don't make it back with the DNA 
before her systems done cycling the protoform will perrish along with 
your girlfriend."

Lunarpine returned to the pod he'd arrived in and set a return course 
back to the ark.
